      • filterINodeXAttrs

        static List<XAttr> filterINodeXAttrs(List<XAttr> existingXAttrs,
                            List<XAttr> toFilter,
                            List<XAttr> filtered)
                              throws org.apache.hadoop.security.AccessControlException
        Filter XAttrs from a list of existing XAttrs. Removes matched XAttrs from toFilter and puts them into filtered. Upon completion, toFilter contains the filter XAttrs that were not found, while fitleredXAttrs contains the XAttrs that were found.
        Parameters:
        existingXAttrs - Existing XAttrs to be filtered
        toFilter - XAttrs to filter from the existing XAttrs
        filtered - Return parameter, XAttrs that were filtered
        Returns:
        List of XAttrs that does not contain filtered XAttrs
        Throws:
        org.apache.hadoop.security.AccessControlException

      • checkXAttrSize

        private static void checkXAttrSize(FSDirectory fsd,
                  XAttr xAttr)
        Verifies that the combined size of the name and value of an xattr is within the configured limit. Setting a limit of zero disables this check.
